attributes.action: tax , legalise and educate [pro/anti ] about all recreational drugs
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Most recreational drugs have problems associated with them whether addiction or physiological .
Adults should be allowed to do as they wish .
I propose that no drug should be banned and should be on open sale possibly in a 'pharmacy' . These drugs should be taxed and a minimum of 50% of this money should be channelled into an unbiased education as to the effects of that particular drug [good and bad]. 
Hopefully , this would cut both cut down on the use of most drugs as the person would be informed about what he/she was proposing to do , and if they still wished to do that , what right has a government to ban its citizens from doing what they wished [ and where it's not harming others] .
It would also reduce organised crime , increase the govenrments' revenues and also stop people being pressured into taking harder drugs
